general.find-and-replace: Find and replace text in text
general.ip-range-calc: Calculates the smallest CIDR block encompassing a given list of IP addresses
general.json-xml: Convert JSON to XML and XML to JSON
general.keming: Add spaces between letters in text
general.levenshtein-distance: Calculate the Levenshtein distance between two strings
general.luhn-validator: Validate numbers with the Luhn algorithim
general.password-strength: Estimates the strength of a passphrase
general.text2hash: Calcluates the hash (md5, sha1, sha2, keccak) of a string
general.union-intersection: Perform a union or intersection on two sets of lines/strings
general.unique-lines: Remove duplicated lines from a body of text
general.word-count: Counts the number of characters, words, and lines in a body of text

enwp.ffd2a: Quickly generate Ffd2a entries for FfD

global.category-members: List category pages with basic namespace filtering
global.template-transclusions: Get the list of pages transcluding a page/template
global.user-uploads: List a user's uploads in plain text
global.wikilinks-from-list: Generate wikitext links from a list of titles
